comments:
Description:
getHideRuleExpression() does not work for grid.

Build number:
2.1.2.v20061220-0710

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a grid with a labels
2. Add a visibility to the grid, choose hide in pdf
3. Choose the label, switch to Script view, add "this.helpText=
   this.getParent().getParent().getParent().getHideRuleExpression("pdf")[0]" 
   in "onPrepare" method
4. Preview, mouse hover the label

Expected result:
Helptext is "pdf".

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
Error.ScriptEvaluationError ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.EngineException: There are errors evaluating script "this.helpText=this.getParent().getParent().getHideRuleExpression("pdf")[0]". at And now the script should be set as follows:
this.helpText= "\"" + this.getParent().getParent().getParent().getHideRules()[0].format +"\""
